name: strict-types
description: Adds layer of strictness to writing JavaScript by throwing errors when variables contains values of unexpected types.

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build:*.js && npm run build:*.min.js
scripts.build:*.js: browserify src/index.js -d -s strict | exorcist bin/strict-types.js.map | node tasks/header.js > bin/strict-types.js
scripts.build:*.min.js: browserify src/index.js -d -s strict | uglifyjs --mangle-props 2 -m -c drop_console=true | node tasks/header.js > bin/strict-types.min.js
